title: Complete Project Proposal
description: Write a detailed proposal outlining the project goals, deliverables, and timeline.

title: Review Design Mockups
description: Examine the design mockups provided by the UI team and provide feedback.

title: Implement User Authentication
description: Develop a secure user authentication system using encryption algorithms.

title: Test Application Performance
description: Conduct performance testing to identify and resolve any bottlenecks.

title: Refactor Codebase
description: Optimize the codebase by removing redundant code and improving code structure.
